message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start at a price of $15,000. This is a great deal, considering the value it brings to you.
While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $8,500. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to me.

I understand that $15,000 is a bit steep for you, but $8,500 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,000. This is a fair price that works for both of us, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to go up to $9,500. I'm confident this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm eager to finalize the deal.

I understand that $9,500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm not willing to go much lower than $12,000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, so I'll meet you at $10,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
